name: PACE Cell (Performance Acceleration for Competitive Excellence)
description: The PACE Cell, Anna University Regional Campus Coimbatore, is well equipped with various books on competitive exams. It oversees all awareness and training programs with the avowed objective of assisting student graduates from all departments to succeed in exams such as TNPSC, UPSC, Banking Exams, Railway Exams, and other Government exams. The PACE Cell has two Coordinators, two Assistant Coordinators as well as overall Student coordinators and Student Volunteers through them the cell ensures comprehensive support for students.
